story:
ONCE UPON A TIME IN A GALAXY... no wait...

OK, well Once Upon A Time in a small hamlet quite close actually... a photographer and his trusty  Creative Director slash HMUA slash Fancy Sewing Things Master embarked on a fun little project that took on a life of its own and resulted in multiple photos that were too lovely not to turn into something special. As there were ten characters portrayed, the obvious thing to do was to find two more and MAKE A CALENDAR, BABY!

The True Story

What actually happened is that our photographer, Shane Gagnon, bought a cheesy princess costume for a possible shoot.  He was advised to NEVER BUY A CHEESY COSTUME AGAIN. As I was explaining the merits of a truly fabulous corset, it occurred to both of us that we actually had the concept for something really FUN. Why not do princess pinups? 


Whilst roaming the kingdom searching for the RIGHT princesses, we realized that the girls we wanted to work with were incredibly strong and independent women, not professional models, often pierced and/or tattooed... and we thought that they might not be into it... because... pink and fluffy. But they LOVED the idea! They all seemed to have an inner heroine that they connected with and had "always wanted to dress up as". After months of creating the costumes and sets and organizing cupcakes and pseudo-wolves, we were ready. 

So... Pinup then?

Welll... we both love pinup but also we both love cosplay. Really what we decided to do is to combine them. Pinup is usually much simpler and much more vintage inspired. This is completely fantasy... BUT with a definite vibe of authenticity. It was very important to us... MOST important... to not re-create certain characters from... a certain large-ish company that may or may not start with D. So we went back to the core of the original stories, looked up the historical references, and created our own translation. Sure, Pocahontas wouldn't have worn metallic tattoos, but she would have been tattooed or painted and she DID look pretty much like this... 


...except, you know, less manicured. And Tara IS of First People's heritage so it was very important to us that she feel both connected and happy with her character. Each girl is very connected to their portrayals and I think that lends the final product a level of authenticity. They aren't simply cute photos.  The root of cosplay is making a character your own, so we did this by applying a level of pinup fantasy to our historical research. In a word... it's "Authentically unique." 

OK... two words. 

What, Why, How?

We now have a fabulous selection of images and we need to DO something with them. With your help we can cover the cost of printing and distribution of a limited number of products including a 2016 Calendar that includes Alice, Ariel, Snow, Cinderella, Belle etc. All the favourites. Go ahead and click on the GALLERY tab at the top of the screen to see our regularly updated photos. We will be sharing both edits and behind the scenes throughout the campaign. There are unique images for the calendar, the posters and the postcard sets as well as special edition images for the storybook.

  • Printing and distributing a limited run of high quality calendars will cost just over $800. We have already covered the expenses up till this point with sets and costumes etc. We just need some help to get the calendars produced.
  • Part of why we are asking for help is to see what the volume of printing needed is. We are hoping to exceed our goal and to be able to offer extended perks so we have asked for the minimum we need to get the calendar out but are very open to extending the product run and adding perks such as limited edition, signed prints. 

The Line at the Bottom 

This project was a HUGE amount of work, but it was also the most fun we have had with a side project. The girls' enthusiasm was absolutely astounding and they all brought their A game and truly became their characters. We realize that this could be something that we could continue to create and in fact, we have already started to work out the logistics of "Project: Fairytale Villain" If there is enough interest in this project we will use the funding to continue. LET US  KNOW IN THE COMMENTS BELOW OR ON THE FACEBOOK PAGE IF YOU LOVE THIS IDEA!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute we still want you to be part of what we are doing! If you use social media please consider sharing the Fairytale Heroine Project. IN FACT:

  • The person who sends us the most shares through facebook will receive a Limited Edition Postcard with a note from their favourite Heroine (on the card).
  • The person who sends us the most traffic using the Indiegogo share tools will receive a signed Fairytale Heroine 2016 Calendar.
  • The person who tweets #FairytaleHeroines2016 the most with a link to the Campaign will receive a VIP (Very Important Princess) Package from their favourite Heroine. 

And that's all there is to it. The End. Beginning...
story_txt:

OK, well Once Upon A Time in a small hamlet quite close actually... a photographer and his trusty  Creative Director slash HMUA slash Fancy Sewing Things Master embarked on a fun little project that took on a life of its own and resulted in multiple photos that were too lovely not to turn into something special. As there were ten characters portrayed, the obvious thing to do was to find two more and MAKE A CALENDAR, BABY!

The True Story
What actually happened is that our photographer, Shane Gagnon, bought a cheesy princess costume for a possible shoot.  He was advised to NEVER BUY A CHEESY COSTUME AGAIN. As I was explaining the merits of a truly fabulous corset, it occurred to both of us that we actually had the concept for something really FUN. Why not do princess pinups? 



Whilst roaming the kingdom searching for the RIGHT princesses, we realized that the girls we wanted to work with were incredibly strong and independent women, not professional models, often pierced and/or tattooed... and we thought that they might not be into it... because... pink and fluffy. The person who sends us the most traffic using the Indiegogo share tools will receive a signed Fairytale Heroine 2016 Calendar.
The person who tweets #FairytaleHeroines2016 the most with a link to the Campaign will receive a VIP (Very Important Princess) Package from their favourite Heroine.    And that's all there is to it. The End. Beginning...

story:
Laguna is a complete theming package for freedesktop.org compliant desktop environments like KDE Plasma, Gnome or Cinnamon. This includes the following:

  • Shell theme
  • Widget theme
  • Window Manager decoration
  • Laguna icon theme
  • Laguna cursors
  • Laguna themed wallpapers.

This is the complete package for those looking to extensively customize their desktop system. The art and style of this theming suite is tidy, smooth and playful. Flat colors in contrast with round borders in the icons and a smooth dark color scheme that's easy on the eyes for the windows. Assets are custom made to fit into each other and give the user a final and exciting experience with this theme.



We need your help to transform our vision into a reality. Creating artwork for freedesktop.org desktop environments is often done as a hobby, practice or as volunteer work. Exactly like its software counterpart. Unfortunately, unlike its software counterpart there's little acknowledgement that countless hours are put into designing, testing and developing the assets required to make a functioning theme. Specially one that wants to support all major desktops with professionalism and consistency. 

We want to change that perception.



To really kick start a project this size there needs to be more than good intentions however. Funding is required in order to pay the people involved in such a task. Food, water and clothing among other commodities like electricity and a reliable Internet connection are important. This is where you come in. You can make this happen. 


  • The campaign's goal of $900.00 USD is to cover the expense(s) of living for the project's estimated development time of 6 months.
  • The campaign's goal is primarily to fund the development of the theming suite for the KDE Plasma environment. However, through stretch goals we hope to extend the development effort to cover the other major freedesktop.org desktop environments.
  • Any funds over and above the campaign's goal will be used to hire more people to allocate to this and future projects, cover the costs of being online and contribute a percentage to Open Source projects.


If we not only meet the goal but exceed it that will mean that by the end of 2016 all the major freedesktop.org desktop environments would have their respective theme suite available and also that by the end of the Q1'17 Windows would be supported and OS X would be supported in Q2'17. If we only meet the goal of the campaign only the Plasma suite will be released on time.






We hope that with this campaign we are able to create a financial engine to cultivate a sustainable artwork culture. As we scale up, we will gear our growth towards systems that will best benefit younger generations of designers.

To prove that working in this field can be a career.

While our long term impact plans are dynamic, we will contribute a percentage of our profits to programs and trainings aimed at Open Design projects.



Our biggest challenge is the size of the project. This is not just icons, not just one theme and not even one platform we'd like to support. Even if the campaign doesn't meet its goal(s) the theme suites will still be developed and released but will take more time to be completed.

  • Even if this is our biggest project yet we have experience in creating artwork and we're sure that users will be glad to be part of this grand project.
  • Our biggest asset are the customers that have supported us through the years.
  • By avoiding high initial overhead we create opportunities for strategic growth with truly positive social impacts.


We know that money can be challenging, we appreciate any help you can offer! 

  • Tell your friends! remember to explain why you find our campaign valuable. Share why its important to you and help others see the value in our campaign as well.
  • Share on social media! help us to connect with people who are all sharing the same things, and bumping us higher on people's feeds.
  • Send us some good vibes! tagging us also helps to maximize our exposure.

story:
I am a first generation college student finishing my associates degree this semester. I'm planning on continuing school for a degree in Art Education. I teach at my local Senior Center and for the local Vo-tech. I teach ages 3+ and love every minute of it. I am continuing to learn and create every chance I can.  One of my dreams has been to travel and actually see works of art I've only dreamt of seeing. I'm vigorously working on raising and saving money to be able to have the chance to study abroad with Seminole State College through a global studies trip. To express my sincere gratitude, I am offering handmade items in exchange for donations. Check my stuff out. I hope you will be impressed and willing to help me achieve my dream! 

DON'T FORGET TO LOOK AT THE GALLERY TO SEE EXAMPLES OF MY WORK :)

story:
THE PROJECT:

The goal of SFC- NY to Japan is to begin a cross-cultural collaborative workshop series drawing from wabi sabi: an element of traditional Japanese Buddhism which highlights the beauty of nature's imperfections. While this aesthetic and mindset is unique to Japanese culture, the nature of SFC's collective exploration will be to uncover the potential psychological benefits such an aesthetic might bring to culturally diverse groups.

The workshop will introduce introspective visual art and aesthetic practice inspired by wabi sabi to combat perfectionism and premature stress in youth communities in NYC. The resulting work of all participants will be collected in a digital and print publication following the residency and workshop series.

THE RESIDENCY:

I'm incredibly excited to have been offered a 6 week residency this winter at Studio Kura: a gallery and art workshop center in Fukoka, Japan. I will be using the residency to explore and create around the concept of wabi sabi alongside Japanese artists and students, and will use the resulting bodies of visual work to develop the international expressive art workshop mentioned above. 


WHAT IS SEE FEEL CREATE?


See Feel Create began in 2012 as an international expressive art workshop series in Chiang Rai, Thailand. The program initially focused on the development of a culturally sensitive workshop series for at risk youth at THE SOLD PROJECT, teaching visual art as a tool for emotional expression. 

Three years, a short book, a zine series and one masters thesis later, See Feel Create has evolved into a flourishing international project, engaging youth and adults from Chiang Mai to Bangkok, the UK, and across NYC. Between collaborations with public schools, local nonprofits, studios, galleries and dedicated community artists, hundreds of youth and adults have taken part in See Feel Create's projects and programs. Teaching environmental, social and personal mindfulness through innovative visual arts curricula, See Feel Create guides participants through the development of visual work with both personal and public significance. 

A LITTLE ABOUT ZOEY:


 Zoey Hart is a Brooklyn-based teaching and practicing artist working primarily in multimedia collage and collaborative social practice. Since completing her interdisciplinary MA program at NYU Gallatin, Zoey has lived, traveled, and worked with students from a kaleidoscopic range of cultures and social backgrounds, teaching elements of visual expression to ignite social change. Back in Brooklyn, Zoey works with communities of young artists and thinkers to forge experiential art collaborations. 

Hart's visual work explores the aesthetics of organic imperfection through printmaking, artifact collection and multimedia collage. Inspired by the unfolding adventures of her own chronic autoimmune ailments, Hart seeks to merge internal and external realities through the depiction and distortion of biological and environmental landscapes.

THE FINANCIAL SCOOP:

Here's a break-down of how your donations will support this project

$2,500--- Cost of transportation, materials and residency fee for Studio Kura 

$1,000--- Coordination with NYC schools, nonprofits and artist communities to          promote workshops, host SFC Wabi Sabi workshops

$1,000---Cost of running a 3 part workshop series with artist or youth community in Brooklyn (includes teaching artist fees, transportation, materials)

$500-- Cost of producing publication of SFC: Wabi Sabi documenting works produced by workshop students and collaborators. 

***If fundraising goal is not reached, all funds raised will go towards continued SFC locally-based programming.


Can't give money but still want to help?

SHARE THE CAMPAIGN! Facebook, twitter, local coffee shops... please help spread the word!

DONATE YOUR MILES An enormous part of this project's expense is international travel. If you have an overflowing pocket of miles and would want to transfer them over, please be in touch! 


FOR MORE INFORMATION ON ZOEY and SFC PROGRAMMING:

www.zoeyAhart.wordpress.com

www.facebook.com/seefeelcreate

www.studiosubway.tumblr.com

story:
Esther Jones, Artist

My name is Esther and I am an artist. In addition to being legally blind in one eye, four years ago I suffered a massive staph bone infection that left me in a wheelchair, unable to walk. However, that did not stop me. I have always had a passion for life and love to express it through my art. Now, due my disabilities, I am limited in certain ways like easily maneuvering to exhibit my art or even working in other types of jobs to start my business, my passion, ArteByEsther LLC. This is why I am turning to you and asking for your help so I can continue my dream, passion, and inspiring others to Never Give UP. 


The Goal

I am looking to raise funds for the following:
  • Travel to exhibitions;
  • Equipment to display my artwork;
  • Supplies;
  • Host exhibitions and art shows;
  • Shipping supplies; and
  • Adaptive Assistance.
These products and services will enable to me share my art with a wider audience and truly launch my business.

Risks & Challenges

My biggest challenge is simply getting around. I require special assistance getting to art shows and traveling. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand not everyone is in a position to help financially.  Whether you are able to help financially or not, please share my mission with your circle of influence to help the campaign.  As always, I appreciate your continued love and support!

story:
We don't want your money, we want your soul.

Every contributor must send us a piece of their soul, via email. It can be anything: a drawing, a poem, a picture of your nan - anything that gives away a little part of you.

We will use the money raised to collate all the contributions in an elegantly bound book which will be sent to Mr Trump at the conclusion of the campaign.

You can see other people's contributions at soul4trump.com

story:
Short Summary

 

  • The tailoring workshop building at the Historical Haydarpaşa Central Train Station which was constructed at the beginning of 1900s, will host a public event for the first time. At this historical building, DAS Art Project -which aims to make young and new artist working in contemporary art environment visible- will host its first exhibition titled “Oxytocin: Experiments on Trust”. The exhibition will open on the 14th of October 2016 for only one day 
  • DAS Art Project is named after the article ‘das’ in German language. The article ‘das’ does not mean anything per se, but emphasizes the word it precedes. DAS Art Project expresses that the main objective is to present art projects and the team advocates for androgenity symbolized by this article which is used with neutral and genderless words instead of masculine or feminine articles in many languages.

  • More than 20 young artists are now working on their art productions under the theme of "Oxytocin". We invite all the visitors to an deserted and uncanny building to experience and analyze the question of trust. It's really important for us to realize our first project without depending on big companies for sponsorship, as a non-profit art organization. In highly industrialized and capitalized art scene of our days, we'll appreciate if you can support us to create our young and free project in our un-free country. 

             

            

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need 2500 US.dollars to reach our goal. This amount will generally be used for technical equipment, electrical installation, logistics, transportation and production of new art works. 
  • If you could support us, we'll express our gratitude toward you by mentioning your name in our catalog, even (if our sponsor of catalog permits) we can give you an entire page in which you can express yourself with a text, a photo or a drawing about our curatorial theme, and you can be a participant to our community.
  • The funds raised will principally go to the technical installation (generator, projection, 80 halogen lambs, cables, outdoor lighting)  and production of exhibition (production of new art works, their transportation and conversation)
  • We know that it is a kind of a luxury, a privileged thing to demand fund-raising in order to open an art show in this world devastated by wars, terror, politics, violence and hunger. We know that it seems excess but art is art and soul is soul, and we do need art in these times of crisis, at least to somewhat relieve our pain and to share our grief and passion.

 

The Impact

 

  • If we can realise our first project, that will make us and our artist visible, and therefore we can get support from different art organisations to be able to sustain our future projects. This accomplishment will help us to get easier acceptance to prestigious curatorial programs. Besides, the most important one, we can keep our faith alive that solidarity survives. So, we can TRUST.
  • To be transparent, we exhibit the documents of our expenses  (the invoices etc.) during the exhibition as an art piece in order to build a trustful connection between us, visitors and you, supporters.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • You, broke as us, great in social media, please use your talent to promote us on your pages.

We invite all the visitors to an deserted and uncanny building to experience and analyze the question of trust. It's really important for us to realize our first project without depending on big companies for sponsorship, as a non-profit art organization. In highly industrialized and capitalized art scene of our days, we'll appreciate if you can support us to create our young and free project in our un-free country. 

             

            
 

What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:

We need 2500 US.dollars to reach our goal. This amount will generally be used for technical equipment, electrical installation, logistics, transportation and production of new art works. 
If you could support us, we'll express our gratitude toward you by mentioning your name in our catalog, even (if our sponsor of catalog permits) we can give you an entire page in which you can express yourself with a text, a photo or a drawing about our curatorial theme, and you can be a participant to our community.

The funds raised will principally go to the technical installation (generator, projection, 80 halogen lambs, cables, outdoor lighting)  and production of exhibition (production of new art works, their transportation and conversation)
We know that it is a kind of a luxury, a privileged thing to demand fund-raising in order to open an art show in this world devastated by wars, terror, politics, violence and hunger. We know that it seems excess but art is art and soul is soul, and we do need art in these times of crisis, at least to somewhat relieve our pain and to share our grief and passion.


 

The Impact
 

If we can realise our first project, that will make us and our artist visible, and therefore we can get support from different art organisations to be able to sustain our future projects. This accomplishment will help us to get easier acceptance to prestigious curatorial programs. Besides, the most important one, we can keep our faith alive that solidarity survives. So, we can TRUST.


To be transparent, we exhibit the documents of our expenses  (the invoices etc.) during the exhibition as an art piece in order to build a trustful connection between us, visitors and you, supporters.


 

Other Ways You Can Help
 
You, broke as us, great in social media, please use your talent to promote us on your pages.

story:
The Living Odyssey

Books 5-8

Hi I am James Freebury, the Creator and Producer of The Living Odyssey. Over the last year I have been memorizing and performing parts of Homer's Odyssey in translation I have performed publicly 3 times. I ready to take this project further. I am convinced that I am just beginning and that, with your help, this can turn into something much bigger and really exciting!

  To get to that next level my goal now is to build a four book presentation (about 2,000 lines ).  The performance will integrate the work of other artists and performers to create a full and compelling show that builds and expands creatively on the foundations I have laid in early performances.

The 4 books in question will be books 5 through 8. These books cover the part of the story where Odysseus begins his journey back, after a long period of waiting on Calypsos island Ogygia, by traveling through many dangers to the welcoming land of civilized  Phaeacia. In Book 6 and 7 he will meet the Phaeacian court and Nausicaa the Phaeacian princess. In book 8, after the Phaeacians have agreed to send him home, there is a great Banquet and, roused by the tales of the great Phaeacean Bard Demodocus, Odysseus begins to tell his own story. This story comprises most of the Odyssey we remember, sirens, Cyclops etc. This will take place in books 9-12. My plan for this part is to seek out accomplished and inspired actors to be my co-narrators.  To bring this phase and the rest of the Odyssey to life I need to showcase the full potential of this project and format.

         By donating now you will help build a show that both fully expresses vision I have for this project and testifies to the future potential of this project. Ultimately the hope is that I will be able to create a complete Odyssey- the goal is in 2018- using multiple narrators, numerous artist contributions and featuring space for academic and creative discussion.

Meantime, the current project- set for January- would its be an exciting and groundbreaking show- a major culmination and end in itself, many people have adapted the Odyssey and continue to do so but this- book by book- the complete text from memory but with other elements as well- is, I believe, essentially unique. Your contributions will allow me to bring in and properly compensate my collaborators, musicians, artists and planners and secure locations that will shape, inform and elevate the performances. 

I hope that you will join the campaign and help make this possible and share it with others and encourage them to join as well. I am very excited by the structure of rewards I have created I think there is something at every level. I am particularly pleased with the midlevel rewards- like the podcasts- which will feature a fifth secret book, the season pass and the possibility of commissioning a book- the possibility that someone (or a group of you) might ask me to learn a new book and so shape the larger project is very exciting to me. 

Regardless of how you donate, by doing so, you will be shaping not only this performance but the potential of the entire project. By helping to make this January performance all that it can be you will give me strength and confidence to continue and show collaborators, potential collaborators and potential donors what this project can be. So many people have been so supportive and urged me to continue with this- help me to continue on this journey and see where it takes me- help me create something I can be proud of for all time, in this performance, on the way!

Thank you for your support and please share this project! For those you have seen me perform please share your personal experience!

Thank you!

                 Jamie

           Lost Lands Productions

story:
Patrons, supportive friends and collectors I invite you to this fund drive to help me bring more work to realization.

  • I have been painting Hudson River inspired landscapes for the last 10 years showing locally, working in oils and watercolor.
  •  I have a great opportunity to show new work and need to raise $1500 to cover the framing costs which includes large oversized museum glass to protect the airy pastel paintings,
    These works are a departure for me in size and pastels allow me to work in a whole new way I am excited to have been chosen to be in this group show at Blue Hill Cultural Art Center http://www.bluehillartandculturalcenter.com/hom...
     

What I Need

 

I am having the work framed locally and the cost necessitates going to you to help me realize this project. There are reasons why this framing job is costly but necessary.
1)  The largest piece is 60" long and requires an oversized piece of glass which has to be special ordered. 
2) We need to use a frame moulding  deep enough  to support the layers of materials .
2)  In order to protect the work  UV filtering glass is needed. We can not use plexiglass or acrylic sheeting as the static electricity will draw pastel dust to itself.  The glass should not touch the pastel.
3)  All mats used on pastels should be acid-free and cut with reverse bevels; the latter prevents pastel dust from showing on the beveled edges. The mat helps to lift the glass above the pastel.
4) I will have the work in a excellent  spacious gallery where this group exhibit will be on view until April. This is an important next step for my art career and the quality of my presentation is important.

The Impact

Art is by nature optimistic. Art is optimistic because it is alive.

— Patti Smith

Other ways to help

If you can't contribute I would be grateful if you could help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Now&Then Art Exhibition

"The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls." Pablo Picasso

  • We, We: Jessica van Deursen Julia Filament Hüma Birgül and Marit de Wit are professional independent artists of Rotterdam, actively involved in city cultural activity and busy with giving other artists an opportunity to exhibit their art and the audience to be involved into the art world of Rotterdam.
  • Our projects allows artists to exhibit their art for free in city centre, which is good especially for those who are on the beginning of their professional career as an artist. Because we are artists ourselves, we understand the difficulty of financial situation and harsh selection by CV of famous galleries. That's why it is important for us to make exhibiting free. 
  • We think that art activity has to be supported and activated by public, that's why we ask you for help.
  • You are welcome to visit the opening evening of the exhibition and following events during it (poetry evenings, artists talks, workshops, etc.)

Why do we ask YOUR help?

Because we don't ask artists for contribution to be exhibited, we are looking for support from outside, from people who appreciate art and want to support it. 

We need money for: rent location, delivery of artworks, hanging artworks, thanks  volunteers, organise few events (opening evening, poetry evening, performances, lectures, workshops, etc.), musicians, food & drinks, PR and invitations, printing, designing.

As every event, which is organised with love for people, we would like to provide best Opening Evening of the exhibition for our guests and participating artists. For this we want to invite performers, musicians, provide specific food & drinks suitable for this type of artistic event. So if we have enough budget, all those goals can be achieved!

What do you get?

Depends on the amount of love you are willing to help us with, you will get form us:

  • Free entry to all events which we organise during exhibition
  • Gift card
  • Invitation to the art dinner
  • Artwork (1 of 4 by your choice)
  • Pleasure from visiting the exhibition which you helped to make it happen. This we promise 200%!

Other Ways You Can Help

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.

  • Share this project with your friends
  • Share & subscribe for our Facebook page
  • Bring your friends and family to the opening event
  • If you know artists for who it could be interesting - share!
  • Offer your help as a volunteer! Every extra hand is welcome :)

story:
Short Summary

A lot of people ask me how I got into miniatures in the first place and I understand the interest because it is a niche of a hobby. I took ceramics my freshmen year of high school then advanced ceramics my senior year. I started creating miniatures out of polymer clay around my sophomore year of high school. 

It wasn't until my sophomore year in college that I started to sculpt pieces again. My close friend Brittany was the person who encouraged me to go to events with her and sell my work. Based on the success of these events and many friends recommending me to make an online store, this campaign was born.

What I Need & What You Get

  • The money I earn from this campaign would go towards buying sculpting tools, paint, and jewelry findings so I can create jewelry and other supplies that would need to be ordered in bulk.
  • Each person who donates $15 or more will get a handcrafted miniature pin from me!
  • Even if the goal is not met, all of the money earned will go towards buying supplies. 
  • I am a full-time student and General Science Major. Weekdays I spend in school and weekends I work doubles. Making miniatures is in a lot of ways my form of mediating. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you are not able to donate, sharing this post would help tremendously!

Thank you for taking the time to read this!

The estimated delivery date will vary depending on how far it is being shipped out to, it may not take as long as May. Please be patient with me as I am a working student.

story:
2017 Birds Nest Calendar

My name is Julianna and I draw scenes from nature for calendars each year. I began this tradition three years ago after I moved across the country to the Pacific Northwest and wanted to have something to send back home to family and friends at the holidays. My calendars are reminders to notice the intricate details of the world we live in and to daily make the choice to step outside of stress and focus on beauty and wonder. I find scientific nomenclature both beautiful and fascinating so I also add the scientific names of what I draw to each sketch. Field guides have been a significant influence on both my artistic and scientific development and I enjoy the idea of this calendar being both beautiful and instructive, similar to the field guides I grew up reading.  

What We Need & What You Get

This is an opportunity to support Julianna as she takes a step of faith into this new venture.  For this special project we need to raise enough funds to cover the costs of printing the calendars and of course support the artist! 

  • Each month will feature a lovingly hand-drawn study of the nest of a different species.  This calendar is the perfect size to have near your computer or on the counter.
  • It is expected to be about 4 by 6 inches and will hopefully be ready for shipping towards mid-January.  (If this is successful, we promise to start early enough next year for you to even use them for Christmas gifts!)

The Impact

As an artist, Julianna enjoys bringing the diversity she finds in creation to life through her drawings.  This collection of bird nests is no exception - you will enjoy marveling at the diverse construction methods used by each species throughout the new year!  This calendar is an exciting way to both support her new venture and get to enjoy her lovely handiwork throughout the new year!

Even if you have a calendar for 2017 already, think of all the other places where you would enjoy using a small calendar with beautiful artwork!  Please help us get the word out on this campaign and help us support Julianna's new venture!

story:
Pourquoi une autre statufication de Zinédine Zidane est-elle nécessaire?

Ma motivation vient d´abord de mon métier de sculpteur hanté par des figures mythiques et iconographiques contemporaines qui me fascinent et me passionnent. Zidane en est une.  J´avais d´ailleurs commencé à travailler sur une ébauche de sa statufication en 2006 mais je n´avais pas trouvé le soutien financier nécessaire à son aboutissement. On m´avait expliqué que plus personne ne voudrait d´une statue de Zidane après son mauvais geste lors de la finale du « Mondial 2006 ».

Tel un impératif catégorique, j´éprouve depuis quelques années la nécessité sculpturale d´opposer une autre vision, un « pendant » à la statufication strictement négative qui existe de Zidane. Cette dernière qui a pour titre « Coup de boule » est l´œuvre d´un artiste au parcours exceptionnel et qui se trouve être un de mes condisciples de l´école des Beaux-Arts d´Alger entre 1990-1994 ( je tenais à le préciser  par souci de transparence et aussi pour dire que, même si je crée cette  dispute artistique et cette controverse, il n´est nullement question pour moi de porter atteinte à sa personne). Sa démarche qui a consisté à condamner un geste en le prolongeant me laisse dubitatif. "J'ai reçu la violence du geste de Zidane, depuis l'écran, en plein visage. J'ai voulu montrer le côté sombre du héros, le goût du destin inéluctable et l'immédiateté retentissante d'un geste" , a-t-il expliqué:
http://www.lefigaro.fr/arts-expositions/2012/09...

Pourquoi insister sur ce supposé côté sombre de Zidane; il n´a tout même pas tué Materazzi (qui de plus a surjoué sa chute)?Pourquoi cette dramatisation alors que Zidane a été sanctionné par l´arbitre du match qui lui a infligé un carton rouge. Pourquoi le punir Ad vitam æternam dans une sculpture qui réduit toute sa carrière à ce geste qu´ il a regretté?

Libre à lui d´avoir fait le choix de ce thème qui l´a inspiré: désigner Zidane comme le bourreau d´un innocent car c´est bien cela que sa sculpture ( Coup de Boule) montre. Libre aux autres d´en faire l´analyse et de lui opposer un autre regard, une autre œuvre et, c´est ce que je vais m´appliquer à faire  au bénéfice de la pluralité de la vérité et surtout de la diversité de l´art. C´est un combat d´idées, une controverse artistique seine.L´auteur de la sculpture dont il est question, a emprunté le chemin le plus court dans le traitement d´un conflit en focalisant que sur un seul aspect. Tout conflit est complexe!

Quand on parle de ce fameux côté sombre de Zidane, on a l´impression qu' il est question d´une sorte de Jack l´Éventreur, d´un tueur en série, qui parallèlement à sa carrière de footballeur le jour, mène une vie de serial killer la nuit. Tout cela n´est pas sérieux. Est-on vertueux et exempt à ce point de "côtés sombres"  pour les dénoncer et les statufier chez les autres?  À moins  d´être Hitler, Staline etc...  chaque humain a ses qualités et ses défauts.

 

Inversement on peut désigner Zidane comme la victime et Materazzi comme l´agresseur car l´ayant provoqué à plusieurs reprises. Ce dernier qui a dramatisé sa chute s´est relevé « frais comme un gardon » aussitôt Zidane sorti ). L´agression de Materazzi a été invisible donc lâche. Celle de Zidane en a été la réponse visible et répréhensible donc stupide. Déjà bien avant cette action, alors que le médecin de l´équipe soignait la clavicule déboîtée de Zidane qui était à terre ( un coéquipier de Zidane confie que Materazzi avait lancé à son encontre « il est mort le vieux».

La réalité est donc plus complexe que ce que donne à voir cette sculpture  diffamatoire à l´encontre de  Zidane. Materazzi a d´ailleurs été sanctionné par la commission de discipline de la Fédération internationale (Fifa). C'est la première fois, dans une affaire de discipline, que le provocateur est lui aussi condamné. confirme Jean-Pierre Escalettes, président de la Fédération française de football (FFF).

 

Analyse de la l´oeuvre "Coup de Boule et l´avis des philosophes
sur le mauvais geste de Zidane

L´œuvre en question, en plus de ses nombreuses lacunes techniques, donne l´impression d´une figurine en dépit de ses cinq mètres. Elle ne rend aucunement la dynamique et l´esthétique de ce  « mauvais geste réussi... exécuté avec maestria »  [dixit Ollivier Pourriol] : https://youtu.be/EggM9CxK0lY

 

La sculpture monumentale n´est pas un instant photographique : l' artiste à réalisé une photographie en trois dimensions. Il en a repris naïvement (sans la maîtrise du langage et des techniques de la sculpture statuaire)  les détails (tous les plis des vêtements et toutes les rides des visages, le positionnement des bras ...) pensant atteindre par ce biais la force de cette action entre Zidane et Materazzi.  Le résultat est affligeant: deux mastodontes figés qui font la grimace. Ces erreurs monumentales ne sont pas étonnantes quand l' on sait que l' auteur n' est pas sculpteur mais peintre de formation à la base. S' il excelle dans ses installations et autres expérimentations conceptuelles, il n'a aucunement les moyens artistiques de l' art de la Sculpture statuaire. Néanmoins, cette œuvre recèle une qualité et pas des moindres: les proportions des corps des personnages sont justes.

Michel Serres parle du coup de boule de Zidane comme celui d´un Dieu de l´Olympe (Dieu colérique).Ollivier Pourriol, qui analysait le mauvais geste de Schumacher sur Battistan lors du France/ Allemagne (1982) et celui de Zidane dit: « Schumacher a fait un mauvais geste pour gagner, Zidane a fait un mauvais geste pour perdre, chez l´un il y a la mesquinerie de vouloir gagner, chezl´autre il y a la superbe de jouer une défaite plus grande (…) qui est la seule beauté qui reste dans la défaite.

Zidane un héros national indéboulonnable ?
Loin des intentions et de la volonté de l´artiste évidement, son œuvre fait écho à ce discours raciste qui semblait n´avoir attendu que ce mauvais geste de Zidane pour entreprendre le déboulonnement de sa stature. Zizou passe subitement de statut de héros national à celui
d´ « un jeune des quartiers difficiles qui ne sait s´exprimer que par la violence. Il est indigne de porter le maillot tricolore ... ».

Elle fait aussi écho à cette levée de boucliers aux desseins inavoués qui à longueur d´articles et d´émissions de télévision, dissertent  encore aujourd´hui sur les côtés sombres de Zidane et de sa supposée intouchabilité et aussi de sa relation à l´argent. 

On insiste sur le fait qu´il gère parfaitement son image qui est son capital. On lui reproche de gagner beaucoup d´argent comme si c´était immoral et indigne de l´ amour que la France et le monde lui vouent. On lui reproche « ce coup de boule violent » devant des milliards de téléspectateurs et d´enfants en particulier qui n' a pas entamé sa popularité car intouchable ( le choix des mots n' est pas anodin) .

Sur la question de la violence, notamment à la télévision, à côté des images des massacres de tout genre, la violence sexiste de la publicité, la violence tous azimuts des programmes destinés aux enfants et aux adolescents, le coup de boule de Zidane, passe pour une dispute de cour de récré. De qui se moque-t-on ? Au final, ce que l´on tente de nous expliquer par là, c’est que Zidane le "violent" le " privilégié", l' "intouchable",  le "capitaliste",  n´est pas digne d´être une icône française.

Mais rien n´y fait, en dépit de tout Zidane reste Zidane, cet amour absolu et irrationnel qu’on lui voue agace.

Georges Bizet l´a pourtant bien dit dans son opéra Carmen que j´apprécie particulièrement: « L´amour est un oiseau rebelle que nul ne peut apprivoiser » , « l´amour est enfant de Bohême il n´a jamais connu de loi ».

Issu d´une famille originaire de Kabylie, Zizou natif de Marseille où il a grandi  demeure le seul français originaire d´Afrique du Nord à devenir une telle icône française. C´est là justement que se situe  la grandeur et le génie de la France qui donne sa chance à tous ses enfants.

Après avoir brillé comme footballeur, Zidane brille de mille feux en sa qualité d´entraîneur français du Real Madrid. Il sera sans aucun doute dans un avenir proche le patron de l´équipe de France.
La France a donné sa chance à Zizou et il le le lui rend brillamment

Si l´on veut sincèrement s´attaquer au monde de l´argent et aux côtés sombres de l´humanité, il faudrait prendre le problème à sa source et en commençant par son propre examen de conscience. Sinon, il serait plus honnête de ne pas s´ériger en donneur de leçons.

 

MON PROJET

Il s´agit de statufier Zidane dignement et dans sa complexité d´Homme hors du commun.Avant d´aboutir à la composition actuelle, que je présenterai plus loin, je suis passé par plusieurs étapes. Au départ j´ai essayé d´opposer avec une pointe d´ humour au « coup de boule » de mon condisciple un « coup de tête » en référence au doublé de la tête par Zizou lors de la finale du « Mondial 1998 » face au Brésil. Cependant, les impératifs de l´école classique à laquelle j´appartiens, m´ont contraint à abandonner cette piste, les maquettes réalisées de Zizou dans l´action des deux buts de la tête ne répondaient pas aux critères d´une statue de facture classique qui exige de la sobriété et aussi que l´on dépasse la simple anecdote. De telles compositions sont destinées plus à la réalisation de figurines que de statues.

Chez Materazzi en Italie, à Florence plus précisément en août 2016 devant « David », la solution s´est révélée à moi. C´est ainsi que j´ai résolu la problématique de la composition de ma statue de Zidane. Je regardais « David » mais c´est Zidane que je voyais. Michel-Ange a sculpté son David dans un seul bloc de marbre de Carrare. Initialement placé à Florence devant le Palazzo Vecchio pour symboliser la détermination de la jeune République face aux tyrans (David est représenté ici juste avant son combat contre Goliath), l'original est exposé depuis 1873 dans la Galleria dell'Accademia : http://www.florence-museum.com/fr/

 

À chaque fois que je suis devant ce marbre haut de cinq mètres, réalisé il y a cinq siècles, je n´ai pas l´impression de contempler une vieillerie. David demeure contemporain. Ce chef d´œuvre traverse allègrement les siècles et semble résolu à accompagner l´humanité jusqu´à la fin des temps.C´est une œuvre que je n´ai jamais fini de contempler. Á chaque visite je passe des heures à la dessiner et je la redécouvre à chaque fois nouvelle. Zidane exerce la même fascination sur des millions de gens. J´ai même entendu un journaliste sportif dire : «À chaque fois que je vois Zidane,je suis heureux » .

 

Si j´ai choisi d´interpréter cette statue et sa symbolique, c´est moins par facilité que par défi. Le défi de revisiter ce monument de la renaissance vient de mon enracinement dans cette période de laquelle je puise mes interrogations artistiques présentes.

Le David de Michel-Ange est un jeune homme déterminé au regard menaçant, sa posture ne laisse aucun doute quant à l´issue du combat qu´il s´apprête à livrer contre le géant Goliath.Je trouve du David dans l´allure sobre de Zidane, le même froncement des sourcils qui soutient un regard glaçant fixant sans trembler celui de l´adversité.Avant cette finale du Mondial 1998, personne ne croyait à une victoire de la France face à ce géant qu´était le Brésil. À ce stade de la compétition Zizou n´avait marqué aucun but, il avait même été sorti sur carton rouge lors du premier tour après avoir essuyé ses crampons sur la cuisse d´un joueur saoudien qui l´avait taclé.

Sur un corner, comme surgissant de nulle part, il marque de la tête le premier but. Comme pour démontrer que ce premier but n´était pas le fruit du hasard, sur un autre corner, il marque à nouveau de la tête et „libère la France“. C’est à ce moment que le coup de foudre s´est produit pour donner naissance à un amour fou, donc inconditionnel, entre lui et la France. Zidane venait de conquérir à cet instant, à jamais, le cœur d´un pays qui a baigné cet été de 1998, dans une allégresse que certains n´ont pas hésité à comparer à celle de la libération.

L´héroïsme de Zidane c´est d´ avoir délivré la France de son complexe d´infériorité « footballistique ». Même si le mérite revient à toute l´équipe et son staff, c´est Zidane qui symbolise cette victoire aux yeux des français pour les raisons que j´ai proposées plus haut.C´est pourquoi j´ai choisi d´immortaliser cet événement, celui de la naissance d´une légende.

 

LA STATUE

Titre:  Coup de Génie

Aspects techniques :

- Réalisation d´un bronze haut de deux à cinq mètres ou tiré en deux exemplaires de deux mètres chacun , selon les fonds récoltés. Il sera fixé sur un socle cubique en granit haut de 1/3 de la hauteur finale de la statue.

- Réalisation d´une plaque gravée des noms de tous les joueurs et ceux du staff technique del´équipe de France de 1998 (fixée sur le socle).

- Réalisation d´ne plaque comportant les noms des donateurs (fixée sur le socle)

Bronze : Alliage de cuivre et d'étain à forte teneur en cuivre (le plus souvent supérieure à 80 %).

Aspect plastique :
Cette statue qui reprend presque dans le détail la composition de David, est un déhanché, elle représente Zizou pieds nus habillé d´une tenue de footballeur. Il tient de sa main droite contre sa hanche un ballon de football (David tient dans sa main gauche une pierre). La main du bras gauche replié sur l´épaule tient les lacets des crampons portés au dos (David porte ainsi sa fronde).

À l´arrière de sa jambe droite, le trophée du « Mondial 1998 » est posé.

Sur son maillot est dessiné un coq symbole de la France.

Comme toute figure allégorique cette représentation ne reprend pas une action réaliste, elle est une écriture complexe qui véhicule une multitude de symboliques. Un même détail peut signifier deux choses à la fois, il appartiendra au spectateur de les déchiffrer et de les interpréter au gré de son imagination.

DESTINATION DE LA STATUE :
(selon l´importance des fonds récoltés):Dans le cas de figure où elle serait tirée en deux exemplaires de deux mètres chacune, l´une sera destinée à la ville de Marseille et l´autre à la ville de Paris.

Dans le cas de figure ou elle serait tirée en un seul exemplaire de deux à cinq mètres de hauteur elle sera destinée naturellement à la ville de Marseille.

 

LES ÉTAPES DE RÉALISATION :
(sur la base de la maquette existante et sur la base d´études - dessins- poussées du corps à l´aide d´un modèle vivant possédant les mêmes proportions que Zidane) :


1-Modelage en argile puis moulage en plâtre d´une matrice d´un mètre de hauteur. Cette matrice servira de repère dans la réalisation de la statue finale (procédé habituel en sculpture monumentale).

2-Une fois la statue en argile achevée, elle sera moulée en plusieurs pièces. Les pièces seront ensuite réalisées en cire pour être coulées dans le bronze.

3- Une fois toutes les pièces coulées en bronze, débuteront les travaux d´assemblage et de soudure pour reconstituer la statue.

4- Une fois la statue reconstituée, pour affiner l´ensemble, elle sera ciselée pour la libérer des bavures de la fonte et des traces de soudures.

5- La statue sera ensuite patinée puis polie pour lui donner son aspect final.

 

LES DÉLAIS:

- 12 mois pour une statue de deux mètres

- 18 mois pour une statue de trois à quatre mètres- 20 à 24 mois pour une statue de cinq mètres.

 

Ces délais qui peuvent sembler importants, sont dus au fait qu´il ne s´agit pas de terminer à tout prix mais, de faire et de refaire jusqu´à atteindre, même si cela restera une illusion, un but: celui de la beauté selon les critères de la statuaire classique, (équilibre, proportions et harmonie), conjuguée aux critères de la beauté de mon œil subjectif.

 

COÛTS  (Ils englobent tous les frais liés à chaque étape de la réalisation) :

- €40.000 pour un exemplaire de deux mètres

- €60.000 pour deux exemplaires de deux mètres

- €80.000 pour un seul exemplaire de cinq mètres
story_txt: Pourquoi une autre statufication de Zinédine Zidane est-elle nécessaire?Ma motivation vient d´abord de mon métier de sculpteur hanté par des figures mythiques et iconographiques contemporaines qui me fascinent et me passionnent. Zidane en est une.  J´avais d´ailleurs commencé à travailler sur une ébauche de sa statufication en 2006 mais je n´avais pas trouvé le soutien financier nécessaire à son aboutissement. On m´avait expliqué que plus personne ne voudrait d´une statue de Zidane après son mauvais geste lors de la finale du « Mondial 2006 ».Tel un impératif catégorique, j´éprouve depuis quelques années la nécessité sculpturale d´opposer une autre vision, un « pendant » à la statufication strictement négative qui existe de Zidane. Cette dernière qui a pour titre « Coup de boule » est l´œuvre d´un artiste au parcours exceptionnel et qui se trouve être un de mes condisciples de l´école des Beaux-Arts d´Alger entre 1990-1994 ( je tenais à le préciser  par souci de transparence et aussi pour dire que, même si je crée cette  dispute artistique et cette controverse, il n´est nullement question pour moi de porter atteinte à sa personne). Sa démarche qui a consisté à condamner un geste en le prolongeant me laisse dubitatif. "J'ai reçu la violence du geste de Zidane, depuis l'écran, en plein visage. J'ai voulu montrer le côté sombre du héros, le goût du destin inéluctable et l'immédiateté retentissante d'un geste" , a-t-il expliqué:http://www.lefigaro.fr/arts-expositions/2012/09...Pourquoi insister sur ce supposé côté sombre de Zidane; il n´a tout même pas tué Materazzi (qui de plus a surjoué sa chute)?Pourquoi cette dramatisation alors que Zidane a été sanctionné par l´arbitre du match qui lui a infligé un carton rouge. Pourquoi le punir Ad vitam æternam dans une sculpture qui réduit toute sa carrière à ce geste qu´ il a regretté?Libre à lui d´avoir fait le choix de ce thème qui l´a inspiré: désigner Zidane comme le bourreau d´un innocent car c´est bien cela que sa sculpture ( Coup de Boule) montre. Libre aux autres d´en faire l´analyse et de lui opposer un autre regard, une autre œuvre et, c´est ce que je vais m´appliquer à faire  au bénéfice de la pluralité de la vérité et surtout de la diversité de l´art. C´est un combat d´idées, une controverse artistique seine.L´auteur de la sculpture dont il est question, a emprunté le chemin le plus court dans le traitement d´un conflit en focalisant que sur un seul aspect. Tout conflit est complexe!Quand on parle de ce fameux côté sombre de Zidane, on a l´impression qu' il est question d´une sorte de Jack l´Éventreur, d´un tueur en série, qui parallèlement à sa carrière de footballeur le jour, mène une vie de serial killer la nuit. Tout cela n´est pas sérieux. Est-on vertueux et exempt à ce point de "côtés sombres"  pour les dénoncer et les statufier chez les autres?  À moins  d´être Hitler, Staline etc...  chaque humain a ses qualités et ses défauts. Inversement on peut désigner Zidane comme la victime et Materazzi comme l´agresseur car l´ayant provoqué à plusieurs reprises. Ce dernier qui a dramatisé sa chute s´est relevé « frais comme un gardon » aussitôt Zidane sorti ). L´agression de Materazzi a été invisible donc lâche. Celle de Zidane en a été la réponse visible et répréhensible donc stupide. Déjà bien avant cette action, alors que le médecin de l´équipe soignait la clavicule déboîtée de Zidane qui était à terre ( un coéquipier de Zidane confie que Materazzi avait lancé à son encontre « il est mort le vieux».La réalité est donc plus complexe que ce que donne à voir cette sculpture  diffamatoire à l´encontre de  Zidane. Materazzi a d´ailleurs été sanctionné par la commission de discipline de la Fédération internationale (Fifa). C'est la première fois, dans une affaire de discipline, que le provocateur est lui aussi condamné. confirme Jean-Pierre Escalettes, président de la Fédération française de football (FFF). Analyse de la l´oeuvre "Coup de Boule et l´avis des philosophessur le mauvais geste de ZidaneL´œuvre en question, en plus de ses nombreuses lacunes techniques, donne l´impression d´une figurine en dépit de ses cinq mètres. Elle ne rend aucunement la dynamique et l´esthétique de ce  « mauvais geste réussi... exécuté avec maestria »  [dixit Ollivier Pourriol] : https://youtu.be/EggM9CxK0lY La sculpture monumentale n´est pas un instant photographique : l' artiste à réalisé une photographie en trois dimensions. Il en a repris naïvement (sans la maîtrise du langage et des techniques de la sculpture statuaire)  les détails (tous les plis des vêtements et toutes les rides des visages, le positionnement des bras ...) pensant atteindre par ce biais la force de cette action entre Zidane et Materazzi.  Le résultat est affligeant: deux mastodontes figés qui font la grimace. Ces erreurs monumentales ne sont pas étonnantes quand l' on sait que l' auteur n' est pas sculpteur mais peintre de formation à la base. S' il excelle dans ses installations et autres expérimentations conceptuelles, il n'a aucunement les moyens artistiques de l' art de la Sculpture statuaire. Néanmoins, cette œuvre recèle une qualité et pas des moindres: les proportions des corps des personnages sont justes.Michel Serres parle du coup de boule de Zidane comme celui d´un Dieu de l´Olympe (Dieu colérique).Ollivier Pourriol, qui analysait le mauvais geste de Schumacher sur Battistan lors du France/ Allemagne (1982) et celui de Zidane dit: « Schumacher a fait un mauvais geste pour gagner, Zidane a fait un mauvais geste pour perdre, chez l´un il y a la mesquinerie de vouloir gagner, chezl´autre il y a la superbe de jouer une défaite plus grande (…) qui est la seule beauté qui reste dans la défaite.Zidane un héros national indéboulonnable ?Loin des intentions et de la volonté de l´artiste évidement, son œuvre fait écho à ce discours raciste qui semblait n´avoir attendu que ce mauvais geste de Zidane pour entreprendre le déboulonnement de sa stature. Zizou passe subitement de statut de héros national à celuid´ « un jeune des quartiers difficiles qui ne sait s´exprimer que par la violence. Un même détail peut signifier deux choses à la fois, il appartiendra au spectateur de les déchiffrer et de les interpréter au gré de son imagination.DESTINATION DE LA STATUE :(selon l´importance des fonds récoltés):Dans le cas de figure où elle serait tirée en deux exemplaires de deux mètres chacune, l´une sera destinée à la ville de Marseille et l´autre à la ville de Paris.Dans le cas de figure ou elle serait tirée en un seul exemplaire de deux à cinq mètres de hauteur elle sera destinée naturellement à la ville de Marseille. LES ÉTAPES DE RÉALISATION :(sur la base de la maquette existante et sur la base d´études - dessins- poussées du corps à l´aide d´un modèle vivant possédant les mêmes proportions que Zidane) :1-Modelage en argile puis moulage en plâtre d´une matrice d´un mètre de hauteur. Cette matrice servira de repère dans la réalisation de la statue finale (procédé habituel en sculpture monumentale).2-Une fois la statue en argile achevée, elle sera moulée en plusieurs pièces. Les pièces seront ensuite réalisées en cire pour être coulées dans le bronze.3- Une fois toutes les pièces coulées en bronze, débuteront les travaux d´assemblage et de soudure pour reconstituer la statue.4- Une fois la statue reconstituée, pour affiner l´ensemble, elle sera ciselée pour la libérer des bavures de la fonte et des traces de soudures.5- La statue sera ensuite patinée puis polie pour lui donner son aspect final. LES DÉLAIS:- 12 mois pour une statue de deux mètres- 18 mois pour une statue de trois à quatre mètres- 20 à 24 mois pour une statue de cinq mètres. Ces délais qui peuvent sembler importants, sont dus au fait qu´il ne s´agit pas de terminer à tout prix mais, de faire et de refaire jusqu´à atteindre, même si cela restera une illusion, un but: celui de la beauté selon les critères de la statuaire classique, (équilibre, proportions et harmonie), conjuguée aux critères de la beauté de mon œil subjectif. COÛTS  (Ils englobent tous les frais liés à chaque étape de la réalisation) :- €40.000 pour un exemplaire de deux mètres- €60.000 pour deux exemplaires de deux mètres- €80.000 pour un seul exemplaire de cinq mètres

story:
Short Summary

I’m Charles Mason III, I am an artist based in Baltimore, MD. I have a BFA in graphic design and I’ve been writing as well as a photographer since I was young. Within the last 5 years I’ve been painting and creating mix media and video work. 

I’ve been working on this project for the last 6 months, where I’ve been exploring the use of water colors to discuss critical topics such as love and perseverance through struggle. So much has happened within society that today I feel its necessary to have these discussions. The reason I chose to use watercolors is because of their ability to mix and blend well. With water colors, even blacks are vivid and pop better than acrylics and by juxtaposing the subject matter and medium  it will convey a message that is heavy in content but easily accessible to the audience

What We Need & What You Get

With this campaign I need to  get 1000 worth of funding which will support the creation, printing and distribution of the zine I am around in the process of creating.

With each donation of $35 or more, you shall receive a free zine as well as other perks depending on the amount of the donation.

 

The Impact

The impact will be about the use of subject matter as well as medium. It is important to see narratives of life through different lenses. I believe with the creation of each zine and distribution a community will be formed through the like minded understanding of the different topics I discuss

Other Ways You Can Help

Every retweet, share, repost is just as helpful as a contribution

story:
For the past four years we have been on hand to provide the citizens of Boomtown with everything they need to continue their life long careers of claiming benefits and as with any successful public service we are expanding! Long have the frivolities at the Brighton Fringe Festival gone unchecked and unregulated but no more! The JobCentre will be there to ensure forms are filled, work books are completed and sanctions have been imposed.

 

With any expansion of services there are always associated costs and it is up to you, the job hungry public, to provide the capital we need to help you get back to work. We have a range of opportunities available to you ranging from having us fill out your forms for you (because heaven knows there is no way you could even do that properly...) all the way to your own custom made Sanction Man Jumpsuit (Note: This does not entitle you to the job of sanction man). 

 

A lot of you are very familiar with the JobCentre's rules and regulations which is why we have Rapid Reclaim Appointments available for you and your fellow benefit guzzlers. There are one-to-one appointments available for those actually looking to work and for those of you in a group that know they can shift all the work onto their one friend who never complains, there are group bookings available too.

 

Too lazy to even turn up to an appointment? Does the thought of earning your bi-weekly pay make me feel a little sick inside? Or do you just love us so much you want the whole world to know? Well we have the T-shirts for you! For a small donation you can skip the hassle of actually coming to the Jobcentre by advertising for us instead.

 

For those of you in truly dire straights (your parents have kicked you out of the spare room, your trust fund has finally run out or maybe you've reached thirty and realised you have accomplished nothing) we recommend the Mega Job Pack. This pack contains all you will need to get a job and stand on your own two feet! Stickers, a T-shirt and a Rapid Reclaim Appointment can all be yours for just a small donation.

 

Remember, we are here for your benefits.

story:
Short Summary

I am Dechi Kwabena Samuel from Techiman, Ghana but lives in Wenchi about 45 minutes drive to Techiman. I work here in Wenchi. I was born with artistic qualities like paintings, pencil drawing, architectural designing etc. 

So as I started schooling I mastered on that, but i am from a poor family where it is hard to get on top of the ladder to showcase my skills, so I decided to use my talent for a living and it has helped me earn a bit of living. 

I am visionary and always see the big picture, but it is not easy getting good things happen unless you're in contact with a good community where the people see the same picture. so sometimes it's difficult reaching my goal.

I am running this campaign to solicit funding to build a workshop and a training center to train the youth in the community who are on the same train as me to know their power, importance of their talents and their worth to the community.

Many youth who offer technical and vocational courses at school are usually looked down on making them loose their vision but I see a bright future with an Art Center for the youth to be trained and offered jobs to earn a living aside receiving training.

This campaign is important to me as I don't want potential leaders loose perspective in life, but to make a great impact to the generation to come and empower the weak visioned to grow big in vision.

If I am funded, i personally will be a stable worker along with the poor but talented youth in my community and we can secure a great future, I promise to make donors proud and nothing less.

 

An amount of USD 45000 will help me get the land and building done including electricity and other appliances relating to the building and USD 32000 will be needed to secure machines, equipments and material to get started

If this is achieved then productions will be the next level, Names of Donors will be brand names for our products.

even if i don't reach my entire goal, i will do my best to make the work get started,  the income that comes in from production will be used for continuation,  As indigenous methods can be used in production and later we can introduce machines when we can.

 

This project when done will offer job for the youth in fields like tailoring, printing, carpentry, welding, arts like portraits, leather works, painting, decorations etc, which will in the long run provide income for them to reduce social vices, because when the youth is working they have much focus than when they are not and it will bring peace in our lives which will make this world a far better place.

 

I have had contact with few people who wanted to work with me but most of them were in to used me reach their dreamland.

I started the tiger brand T-Shirts designs but after the designs were sent to the person who I don't want to mention their name, they told me their what and what has been hacked but I later saw the shirt circulating on the market and there was nothing I could do as they have got my designs registered as theirs, If it wasn't cheating, I would have been the architect of such a great venture but I haven't loose hope, I am gifted and i have more in store to bring out if this project is successfully funded.

My Facebook album with title "ART WORKS" is the evidence to my claims of talent. I was born with this and I increase more and more daily as I grow and mature.

 

In every business venture, there are risks involved, YES! and Mine is no exceptional as It is also vulnerable to risks and challenges;

Dynamism in the Art market is a major challenge as few recognizes this as a challenge cos Art moves with everyday life and if you stay behind in Art, it is likely business will collapse because its our duty to produce what matches the appetite of the consumer and anything otherwise won't work, because of this, I have taken it upon my self to always survey the art market to know what is trending at any particular time so that workers will be educated on what to produce at a given period of time.

Also reception can be a challenge because if you're in an area where there's always tourists, one must have the qualities to interact with people from different walks of life as Art deals with all races of people and cultures, acceptance, tolerance and good interpersonal relationship must work and with this, I have the urge to train receptionists to interact with people without troubles. 

 

Please with all due respect, I will beg each and everyone of my backers to share the good news on every platform they get to make this dream a reality and i promise you nothing but to make you feel proud and never regret.

kindly use the Indiegogo share tools to help make this a great milestone.

 

Many Thanks to you all as we make this work.

Stay Blessed each and everyone of you

story:
About Baluk Arts and InCahoots

Baluk Arts is a non-profit Victorian Aboriginal arts organisation based in Mornington and owned by Aboriginal artists from Frankston, the Mornington Peninsula and greater Melbourne.  Member artists belong to diverse Aboriginal backgrounds from all over Australia. Baluk is a local Boonwurrung word meaning many or group of people.

Baluk Arts was selected to participate in an innovative project called InCahoots, which has seen 12 of our members collaborate with Neil Aldum, a Perth-based artist. While the artist's origins are diverse their community is connected by common narratives of disconnection of family, language and country.Together they have shaped a series of sculptures that speak of the contentedness of these upheavals and solace that comes from their shared experience – undulating and moving together with the changing physical and cultural landscape. Using ancient igneous rock as their counterweights each pendulum contains works that speak of their personal stories.

What We Need

Baluk Arts aims to raise $5000 to cover accommodation and travel costs for our artists to get to the exhibition opening in Fremantle, WA.  

What You Get

Thanks to Jackson's Dromana each donation (no matter what amount) will go into the draw to win one nights FREE accommodation on the beautiful Mornington Peninsula valued at $600.

Any donation exceeding $200 will grant you membership to our Ochre Club, an exclusive network of donors and supporters. For Ochre Club members we offer unique opportunities for you to have a deeper experience of the artistic riches of Baluk Arts;
to enjoy more intimate connections with artists, staff and fellow supporters. This could look like previews of exhibitions, networking lunches etc.

Regardless of the amount, donations are tax deductible as Baluk Arts is a charitable institution with Gift Recipient Status. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us on social media and help us tell the world about this wonderful project!

Facebook: Baluk Arts

Instagram: @balukarts

story:
All the new changes to Chip and Terra would take the entire experience to a whole new level of interactivity and enchantment. The many burners who told us about their amazing and wonderful experiences on B.Y.T.E. last burn will be elated to see how those experiences will be enhanced this year through a stroke of whimsy and a touch of love.

Here's our prioritized wish list of all our dream upgrades that will require a small fortune to be able to accomplish.

Getting the piece there is top priority and this is one of the biggest costs. If you’ve ever tried to rent transportation to the playa, you’ve encountered a disdain some of these companies harbor for Burning Man that allows them to gouge their normal rental fees, so we must secure enough funds for the worst case scenario.

We will need to rent this 15’ box truck for close to 3weeks, since the piece will be coming from our storage in Napa Valley California, while also accounting for build and strike days.

Chip and Terra's virgin year in deep playa had them side by side as they soaked up and analyzed the whole experience for the very first time.

This year, they will be piggy back as they fully embrace the freedom and radical self expression of Burning Man, exuding a playfulness and unbridled immersion.

Chip and Terra, like a butterfly, will break out of their cocoon and evolve into new colorful and expressive fur coats, embracing the radical self expression of veteran burners. 

This year, in addition to our mirrored disco eyes, we are looking to line their fur with net lighting to illuminate their coats in a variety of different colors and patterns.

After the frustrating complications using generators on the playa last year we will be switching to Solar. Not only is Solar clean, renewable energy, but it also further embraces our technological concept. 

Underneath Chip and Terra will be cozy hangouts for lovable burners. 

Terra's belly will be lined with vibrant fur, illuminated by a heart shaped disco ball, for a comfy trip in deep playa.

Chip's belly will offer an artificial hanging garden of colorful leaves, vines and flowers, as well as a cargo net bed, made of power cords, for lazy days out of the beating afternoon sun. At night, the garden will be lit up with multi-colored ambient light.

For Chip's eyes this year, we’ve discovered that, if you nest the mirrored lenses, the effect of the laser beams bouncing around inside produces a mesmerizing universe of light. For that reason, we will be getting Chip larger mirrored lenses to place on top of his existing eyes to give us that awesome solar system light show.

In addition to Chip and Terra’s voices when activated by our Ai vision kit, these speakers will allow the them to play some ambient and foot loose beats in between. We've compiled thoughtful playlists that should ultimately enhance the experience of the livable spaces underneath as well as the danceable spaces up top.

Last year we equipped Chip with an AIY vision kit, allowing him to see and respond to objects and emotional cues. This year, in addition to seeing and speaking, we would like to take it a step further by giving him the ability to hear, as well.

We noticed last year that, while Chip and Terra were the coziest chill out spots, their back's could’ve been even a tad softer. This year we will underlay the fur with cushy carpet padding, making sure your sunsets are the coziest and most magical!

Along with their Ai, we are looking for more fun ways for Chip and Terra to interact with fellow burners. This audio transducer, in conjunction with a haptic-tactile response pad, will allow Chip to vibrate or “purr” when he’s pet in his favorite spots.

The steel cutout BYTE placard helps spectators or participants understand the concept and the various ways in which they may interact with the installation. At night, the stenciled story will be backlit.

After touring BYTE around this year, our hardware is going to need some updating and replacing. In addition, having Terra piggy back Chip is going to take a little more engineering to make sure they’re fun and safe.

Our intention last year was to make one ponder the possibility of a world where robots are not necessarily our enemies or slaves but rather our friends and, to do this, we created giant friendly and furry robots for people to play with. The impact was beyond our expectations.

This year we would like to continue the premise of a potentially peaceful co-existence between human kind and technology by adding a playfulness and whimsy to Chip and Terra that will have your heart instantly flutter with love.

While there are many challenges we face this year, our team has proven to make the seemingly impossible possible last year. Here are the major challenges we've already started tackling.

  1. Fur Lighting
    • Lighting the fur will require some methodical research into lighting options that will be bright enough to shine through the fur, tough enough to withstand the crowds and programmable to bring the fun! We've already found some extremely promising solutions, including programmable net and panel lighting.
  2. Solar Power
    • The playa can be unforgiving and we will have to be cognizant of the dust cover and sun exposure. We will have a maintenance crew on shifts to dust the panels and, if the sun cover is ineffective, turn on our backup generator.
  3. Build Team and Crew
  • This year is an "off" year for a handful of our dedicated crew as they deal with their default world lives, so finding a crew able to take off the time needed to build, maintain and strike will be challenging but we've already begun adding to our family!

We know it's incredibly difficult to let go of your hard earned money, even if it gets ya a cool new necklace, so here are some other ways you may help us if you're psyched about our project but car insurance is a bigger priority.  Either way, we appreciate you and send good vibes your way!

  • Follow us on Instagram @CampByteThis
  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign to anyone who may be interested.
  • Share our campaign on any of your social media accounts with love.

And that's all there is to it.

Heaps of free love and good vibes,

The B.Y.T.E. Team

Solar PowerThe playa can be unforgiving and we will have to be cognizant of the dust cover and sun exposure. We will have a maintenance crew on shifts to dust the panels and, if the sun cover is ineffective, turn on our backup generator.

Build Team and Crew

This year is an "off" year for a handful of our dedicated crew as they deal with their default world lives, so finding a crew able to take off the time needed to build, maintain and strike will be challenging but we've already begun adding to our family!

We know it's incredibly difficult to let go of your hard earned money, even if it gets ya a cool new necklace, so here are some other ways you may help us if you're psyched about our project but car insurance is a bigger priority.  Either way, we appreciate you and send good vibes your way!

Follow us on Instagram @CampByteThis
Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign to anyone who may be interested.
Share our campaign on any of your social media accounts with love.

And that's all there is to it.
Heaps of free love and good vibes,
The B.Y.T.E. Team

story:
LIVING IN THIS BODY

I study classical guitar in the Holy Land of San Francisco. While floating through this movie of life, I paint using my intuition to guide my hand. My intention is to awaken the master in the viewer because NOTHING in this life IS ABOUT ME. 
(....I also just like to make pretty things....) 

The proceeds will fund my college expenses at the San Francisco Conservatory of Music as well as my journey to expand souls through my compositions and artwork. 

So buy some paintings/tote bags/poems/shirts/pretty things.
Every little bit helps.
Eternal thanks and blessings!
